title: SECRET ADVENTURES OF JULES VERNE 13 The Golem [retr?tv]
description:
THE SECRET ADVENTURES OF JULES VERNE
The steam-punk adventures of the young Jules Verne and his fellow travellers aboard the airship Aurora.  <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0178161/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0178161/</a>

13. The Golem   10/8/2000 
Traveling to Paris to celebrate Jules&#039; birthday, Phileas, a disabled Rebecca, and Passepartout, along with Sir Hugo Bezel (chief architect of Paris), arrive just as a golem is on a murderous rampage through the city. After Jules is arrested for the crimes, Phileas and Rebecca each go about in their own way to discover the true murderer; Phileas by seducing the beautiful and talented Angelique, and Rebecca by dispatching Passepartout to do research. It is Jules, however, who unmasks the culprit.

Writer: Paul Pender
Director: Ian Sharp
Guest star: Philippe Lambert (Claude Duval), Caroline Dhavernas (Angelique Dore), Pierre Drolet (Thomas Legrande), Claude Lemieux (Inspector Racine), Luc Proulx (Ambrose), Genevieve St-Armour (Beautiful Woman), Yvette Thout (Mme Dupuis), Jerome Tiberghien (Morgan), Andre Vezina (Doctor), Stephane Archambault (Felix Nadir), Renee Girard (Mme Ludek), Catherine-Anne Lebeau (Brigitte Dussault), Phillippe Martin (Maurice Greve), Jerry Doyle (II) (Sir Hugo Bezel)
